title: NewAir WAT10W Pure Spring Water Filtration Bottle
description:
The WAT10W from the pure spring collection at NewAir is a universal accessory designed to fit most top loading water coolers. Made by a leading brand in the water dispenser market, NewAir can prevent you from wasting money on delivery services and time lifting and carrying water bottles. Enjoy ease and comfort while staying hydrated with the WAT10W. It can filter up to 211 gallons and includes one carbon filter that can last up to 6 months. 

Special Features Include
- 100% BPA Free
- Less expensive than using bottled water
- Holds 3.04 Gallons
- Extremely cost effective and convenient
- Carbon Filtration provides pure clean water
- Exceeds attraction in comparison to any water bottle
- Compatible with all major top loading water dispensers

Cost Effective & Costs Less Than Bottled Water
The WAT10W from NewAir can be refilled endlessly from your tap. Tap water costs less than $0.01 per gallon. Bottled water costs approximately $1.22 per gallon. That's an approximate savings of $1.3975 per gallon. In an average year, that adds up to over $500 for a family of four.

transcripts: Introducing the NewAir WAT10 pure spring water filtration bottle an innovative and healthy filtering system, designed to fit on top of all major water dispensers. it's a stylish and efficient solution, it's BPA-free and can purify after 211 gallons making it one of the most cost-effective and healthy water bottles on the market. We all know we're supposed to drink eight glasses of water a day to keep his balance and healthy but with our busy schedules and life's on the move it's not always easy to remember and it's not always convenient. Where do we turn for easy relief? Where is there a name we can trust. The WAT10 is compatible with every major brand of water cooler there's no special equipment needed just place it on top like an ordinary water bottle. It's a convenient way to keep water close at hand best of all there's no more lifting heavy bottles it's easy to change simply unscrew the old filter and put on the new one. The NewAir WAT10 is free from BPA the harmful chemical compound found in most plastics making it one of the healthiest water bottles on the market. The advanced carbon filter last for about six months purifying 211 gallon and it's a lot less expensive than bottled water based on the national average bottled water comes to about a dollar twenty the cost of that water is less than half percent per gallon that difference can save a family of four five hundred dollars a year and a 50-person office over two thousand dollars. Whether for your home, office, garage or gym the NewAir  WAT10 is the best solution for keeping refreshment close at hand don't build your schedule around staying healthy and hydrated let them fit into your schedule. For dependability and innovation you can count on NewAir. NewAir a name you can trust.
